spec.expr:
_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.cfgtid:* AND $Logsql

_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.cfgtid:* AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.cfgtid:* AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.action,fgt.user) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.cfgtid:* AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.action,fgt.cfgpath) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.cfgtid:* AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.action,log.syslog.hostname) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

options.content:
# LOG_ID_ADMIN*

- 0100032001: LOG_ID_ADMIN_LOGIN_SUCC
- 0100032002: LOG_ID_ADMIN_LOGIN_FAIL
- 0100032003: LOG_ID_ADMIN_LOGOUT
- 0100032005: LOG_ID_ADMIN_OVERIDE_VDOM
- 0100032006: LOG_ID_ADMIN_ENTER_VDOM
- 0100032007: LOG_ID_ADMIN_LEFT_VDOM
- 0100032021: LOG_ID_ADMIN_LOGIN_DISABLE
- 0100032024: LOG_ID_ADMIN_PASSWD_EXPIRE
- 0100032053: LOG_ID_ADMIN_MTNER_LOGIN_SUCC
- 0100032054: LOG_ID_ADMIN_MTNER_LOGOUT
- 0100032561: LOG_ID_ADMIN_LOGOUT_DISCONNECT
- 0100032570: LOG_ID_ADMIN_MTNER_LOGOUT_DISCONNECT

spec.expr:
_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.logid:in(0100032001,0100032002,0100032003,0100032005,0100032006,0100032007,0100032021,0100032024,0100032053,0100032054,0100032561,0100032570) AND $Logsql
AND fgt.method:*
| stats by (fgt.logdesc,fgt.method) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.logid:in(0100032001,0100032002,0100032003,0100032005,0100032006,0100032007,0100032021,0100032024,0100032053,0100032054,0100032561,0100032570) AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.logdesc,fgt.reason) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.logid:in(0100032001,0100032002,0100032003,0100032005,0100032006,0100032007,0100032021,0100032024,0100032053,0100032054,0100032561,0100032570) AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.logdesc,log.syslog.hostname) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.logid:in(0100032001,0100032002,0100032003,0100032005,0100032006,0100032007,0100032021,0100032024,0100032053,0100032054,0100032561,0100032570) AND $Logsql
AND fgt.user:*
| stats by (fgt.user,fgt.logdesc) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.logid:in(0100032001,0100032002,0100032003,0100032005,0100032006,0100032007,0100032021,0100032024,0100032053,0100032054,0100032561,0100032570) AND $Logsql
AND fgt.ui:*
| stats by (fgt.ui,fgt.logdesc) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.logid:in(0100032001,0100032002,0100032003,0100032005,0100032006,0100032007,0100032021,0100032024,0100032053,0100032054,0100032561,0100032570) AND $Logsql
AND fgt.logdesc:"Admin login successful"
| stats by (fgt.user,fgt.logdesc) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
AND fgt.logid:in(0100032001,0100032002,0100032003,0100032005,0100032006,0100032007,0100032021,0100032024,0100032053,0100032054,0100032561,0100032570) AND $Logsql
AND fgt.logdesc:"Admin login successful"
| stats by (fgt.ui,fgt.logdesc) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote})}
| $Logsql
| avg(fgt.totalsession) avg_concurrent_sessions
#| avg(fgt.totalsession) avg_concurrent_sessions, avg(fgt.setuprate) avg_setup-rate

spec.description:
Custom LogsQL filter attached to every query.
Set to "*" to not filter.
See https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victorialogs/logsql/
spec.name: Logsql
